item.title: Small but useful Windows junk cleaner
item.description: I just stumbled upon a nice little utility. It’s called ATF Cleaner. What it does? What you always do when you clean up a computer or remove a virus: it cleans temporary folders, temporary internet files and so on. It’s what you basically do manually every time you start working on a computer with problems. It’s small, fast and useful but as it’s always the case with utilities that erase files you should be careful.
